Name: Bar staff at Stones of the Yarra Valley
Description:
We are looking for passionate and enthusiastic bar staff to work weddings, events and lunch services at Stones of the Yarra Valley and the Stables at Stones.

  • Fantastic team to work and socialise with
  • Fast paced environment
  • We offer you the opportunity to learn and grow with a team of career focused professionals within a fast paced and exciting environment!
  • With three restaurants on site; Meletos, The Stables at Stones and The Barn and hosting over 200 events per year, there is never a shortage of shifts with us!

Within the precinct three successful restaurants currently exist, The Stables at Stones, The Barn and Meletos, which operate for lunch and dinner from Friday to Sunday, in addition to hosting many weddings, private functions and special events. These three venues are all on the same property, and operate independently of each other.
Excerpt: Stones of the Yarra Valley is the premier venue in the region for celebration, hosting over 200 events each year. We are currently searching for excited and inspired bar staff to join our ever growing team!
Requirements:
Working with our Food and Beverage Managers and within a wonderfully talented and dedicated team, you will be committed to maintaining our position as being the very best at what we do.

The vibrant and energetic candidate will be comfortable liaising with customers, have a great knowledge of great food and wine, strong floor experience as a section waiter and a complete understanding of restaurant sequence of service.

Availability to work a flexible roster as the business requires to include weekends and nights is a must. The successful candidates will possess and demonstrate experience with the following key strengths;

  • Immaculate presentation
  • A positive attitude with a strong work ethic
  • Exceptional customer service
  • Ability to keep calm throughout fast paced and busy services
  • Ability to work successfully within a close team environment
  • Commitment to quality, consistency and presentation
  • Knowledge and adherence to all OH&S and RSA requirements 

Only candidates with a right to work in Australia need apply and we will not sponsor 457 visa holders.

For more information on our venues please visit our websites:

www.thestablesatstones.com 

www.stonesoftheyarravalley.com 

www.meletos.com

Name: Bar Staff at Meletos
Description:
As part of the Stones of the Yarra Valley family, we have opened an incredibly exciting venture, Meletos. Meletos is an extremely busy Italian inspired 100 seat boutique cafe adjoining the region's latest microbrewery, cider house, function space and exclusive accommodation, The Farmhouse.

Meletos operates 7 days a week for lunch and dinner, offering wood fired pizzas, seasonal fare and hand crafted ales, in addition to a function space, The Warehouse which hosts private events and conferences for up to 60 guests.

Meletos is hiring:

  • Section Waiters 
  • Casual Bar Staff
  • Event Staff- Food and Beverage Attendants

This is an especially exciting opportunity to be a key part of the most impressive development in the region.

  • As part of the Stones of the Yarra Valley and Meletos family, you will enjoy competitive rates of pay, a picturesque work place and be a valued member of a fun, inspirational and energetic team.
  • We offer you the opportunity to learn and grow with a team of career focused professionals within a fast paced and exciting environment!
Excerpt: Meletos is an extremely busy Italian inspired 100 seat boutique cafe, offering wood fired pizzas, seasonal fare and hand crafted ales. In addition to a function space, The Warehouse which hosts private events and conferences for up to 60 guests. We are currently on the look out for a few enthusiastic bar staff to join our team!
Requirements:
Working with our Food and Beverage Managers and within a wonderfully talented and dedicated team, you will be committed to maintaining our position as being the very best at what we do.

The vibrant and energetic candidate will be comfortable liaising with customers, experience as a section waiter and a healthy understanding of restaurant sequence of service.

Availability to work a flexible roster as the business requires to include weekends and nights is a must. The successful candidates will possess and demonstrate experience with the following key strengths;

  • Immaculate presentation
  • A positive attitude with a strong work ethic
  • Exceptional customer service
  • Ability to keep calm throughout fast paced and busy services
  • Ability to work successfully within a close team environment
  • Commitment to quality
  • Consistency and presentation
  • RSA Certificate

Only candidates with a right to work in Australia need apply and we will not sponsor 457 visa holders.

For more information please visit our website: www.meletos.com

Name: Food and Beverage Rockstars - Assistant Restaurant Manager /Bar Staff /Waiters
Description:
Stones of the Yarra Valley, Meletos and The Stables at Stones is hiring:

  • Sections Waiters (Meletos, The Stables at Stones)
  • Casual Bar Staff (All venues)
  • Event Staff- Food and Beverage Attendants (Stones of the Yarra Valley)
  • Assistant Restaurant Manager (The Stables at Stones) 

This is an especially exciting opportunity to be a key part of the most impressive development in the region.

  • As part of the Stones of the Yarra Valley and Meletos family, you will enjoy competitive rates of pay, a picturesque work place and be a valued member of a fun, inspirational and energetic team.
  • We offer you the opportunity to learn and grow with a team of career focused professionals within a fast paced and exciting environment!
  • For the right candidates, the opportunity to move into a full time position exists.
  • With three restaurants on site; Meletos, The Stables at Stones and The Barn and hosting over 200 events per year, there is never a shortage of shifts with us!

A bit about us

Stones of the Yarra Valley is the premier venue in the region for celebration hosting over 200 events each year.

Within the precinct two successful restaurants currently exist, The Stables and The Barn, which operate for lunch and dinner from Friday to Sunday, in addition to hosting many weddings, private functions and special events.

Additionally, we have opened a highly exciting brand new venture. Part of the Stones of the Yarra Valley family, Meletos is an extremely busy Italian inspired 100 seat boutique cafe adjoining the region's latest microbrewery, cider house, function space and exclusive accommodation, The Farmhouse.

Meletos operates 7 days a week for lunch and dinner, offering wood fired pizzas, seasonal fare and hand crafted ales, in addition to a function space, The Warehouse which hosts private events and conferences for up to 60 guests.

A bit about you

Working with our Food and Beverage Managers and within a wonderfully talented and dedicated team, you will be committed to maintaining our position as being the very best at what we do.

The vibrant and energetic candidate will be comfortable liaising with customers, have a great knowledge of great food and wine, strong floor experience as a section waiter and a complete understanding of restaurant sequence of service.

Availability to work a flexible roster as the business requires to include weekends and nights is a must. The successful candidates will possess and demonstrate experience with the following key strengths;

  • Immaculate presentation
  • A positive attitude with a strong work ethic
  • Exceptional customer service
  • Ability to keep calm throughout fast paced and busy services
  • Ability to work successfully within a close team environment
  • Commitment to quality, consistency and presentation
  • Knowledge and adherence to all OH&S and RSA requirements 

Only candidates with a right to work in Australia need apply and we will not sponsor 457 visa holders.

Have a look at our websites www.thestablesatstones.com www.stonesoftheyarravalley.com and www.meletos.com
Excerpt: Stones of the Yarra Valley is the premier venue in the region for celebration hosting over 200 events each year.

Name: Front of house staff at The Stables at Stones
Description:
We are looking for passionate and enthusiastic front of house staff to join the team at The Stables at Stones. The Stables is an intimate restaurant and events space that is part of the Stones of the Yarra Valley precinct. We are currently on the lookout for enthusiastic and energetic staff to join our team! 

  • Fantastic team to work and socialise with
  • Fast paced environment
  • We offer you the opportunity to learn and grow with a team of career focused professionals within a fast paced and exciting environment!
  • With three restaurants on site; Meletos, The Stables at Stones and The Barn and hosting over 200 events per year, there is never a shortage of shifts with us!

Within the precinct three successful restaurants currently exist, The Stables at Stones, The Barn and Meletos, which operate for lunch and dinner from Friday to Sunday, in addition to hosting many weddings, private functions and special events. These three venues are all on the same property, and operate independently of each other. The Stables hosts lunch on the weekends, as well as dinner services Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights, hosting a 5 or 7 course menu curated by chef Hugh Davison.
Excerpt: The Stables at Stones is currently searching for excited and energetic front of house staff to join our ever growing team!
Requirements:
Working with our Food and Beverage Managers and within a wonderfully talented and dedicated team, you will be committed to maintaining our position as being the very best at what we do.

The vibrant and energetic candidate will be comfortable liaising with customers, have a great knowledge of great food and wine, strong floor experience as a section waiter and a complete understanding of restaurant sequence of service.

Availability to work a flexible roster as the business requires to include weekends and nights is a must. The successful candidates will possess and demonstrate experience with the following key strengths;

  • Immaculate presentation
  • A positive attitude with a strong work ethic
  • Exceptional customer service
  • Ability to keep calm throughout fast paced and busy services
  • Ability to work successfully within a close team environment
  • Commitment to quality, consistency and presentation
  • Knowledge and adherence to all OH&S and RSA requirements 

Only candidates with a right to work in Australia need apply and we will not sponsor 457 visa holders.
